setting.title: Opportunity
setting.columnlabels: Subject,Contact Person,Product,Model No,Description,Priority,Status,Remarks,Opportunity Date,Email Id,Mobile No,Landline No,City Name,Area Name,Enquiry No,Rating,Reason for rating,Address,Assign To
setting.query:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT *,(select top 1 quotation_quotationno from tbl_quotation WHERE quotation_opportunityid=opportunity_opportunityid order by quotation_quotationid desc) AS quotation_quotecode, (select top 1 quotation_totalamount from tbl_quotation WHERE quotation_opportunityid=opportunity_opportunityid order by quotation_quotationid desc) AS quotation_totalamount, (select top 1 quotation_quotationid from tbl_quotation WHERE quotation_opportunityid=opportunity_opportunityid order by quotation_quotationid desc)AS quotation_quotationid FROM tbl_opportunity LEFT JOIN tbl_product ON opportunity_productid=product_productid LEFT JOIN tbl_city ON opportunity_cityid=city_cityid JOIN tbl_client ON opportunity_clientid=client_clientid
LEFT JOIN tbl_enquirystage ON opportunity_enquirystageid=enquirystage_enquirystageid LEFT JOIN tbl_priority ON opportunity_priorityid=priority_priorityid LEFT JOIN tbl_opportunitystatus ON opportunity_opportunitystatusid=opportunitystatus_opportunitystatusid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee ON opportunity_employeeid=employee_employeeid JOIN tbl_enquiry ON opportunity_enquiryid=enquiry_enquiryid LEFT JOIN tbl_campaign ON campaign_campaignid=enquiry_campaignid )r
setting.where: ('$opportunity_employeeid$' = '0' OR opportunity_employeeid = '$opportunity_employeeid$') AND ('$opportunity_opportunitystatusid$' = '0' OR opportunity_opportunitystatusid = '$opportunity_opportunitystatusid$') AND opportunity_opportunitydate BETWEEN '$opportunity_opportunitydate_from$' AND '$opportunity_opportunitydate_to$'
